alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern St. Johns and southeastern Duval Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 725 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Unf, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Unf, Jacksonville Beach, Atlantic Beach, Neptune Beach, Mayport, Craig Field, San Pablo, Fort Caroline and Palm Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northeastern Florida.
